title: Retinal OCT Image Segmentation with U-Net
description: Uses a U-Net deep learning model to segment retinal layers in OCT images, improving diagnostic accuracy and efficiency.

title: Food Delivery App with MERN Stack
description: A full-stack food delivery app using the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express.js, React, Node.js) to create a scalable and efficient web application.

title: RPA Automatic Certificate Generator
description: An RPA tool to automatically create and issue certificates, handling data extraction, certificate generation, and distribution without manual effort.
